QuestData.Title: The Master's Legacy
QuestData.Description: You work for a murderer and a thief.$b$bThat design he wants? It is called the magistrix cut, and it was perfected by my husband. He was killed by Lespin for his secret.$b$bI had him entombed in a small cave north of the city, for we could not make the trip to Tel'anor. Buried with him is a tome that contains the secrets of the design.$b$bRetrieve the design and keep it out of his hands!
QuestData.RewardText: Well well, looks like that old fool finally met his match?$b$bIt looks like the Promenade is in need of a new jeweler, and I think I have learned all I could from my former master.$b$bHere is something for your efforts.
